EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2013.Email Post Event - 2nd Email to Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch Keynotes Tricentis Accelerate 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/>
<!--
-->
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/>
Dear {{Lead.First Name}},
Tricentis Accelerate 2013. Accelerate. Innovate. Automate. Thanks again for making Tricentis Accelerate such a success this year. Now’s your chance to continue the conversation.
Visit accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/> to watch conference highlights and download the recorded sessions. We’ll also have videos and presentation decks from the conference. <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/> Tweet about your conference experiences at #TricentisAccelerate and follow us on Twitter at @Tricentis. You can also follow us on LinkedIn and Facebook.
Please do not forget to fill out our survey <http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1442788/Tricentis-Accelerate-2013>, if you have not done so far.
Thank you for giving us the chance to help you accelerate innovation at your business. We wish you all the best and look forward to seeing you again.
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
If you have any questions or problems watching the videos, please contact us at events@tricentis.com <mailto:events@tricentis.com>
© 2013 TRICENTIS Technology & Consulting. All Rights Reserved.
Tricentis | Leonard-Bernstein-Straße 10 | A-1220 Vienna | Imprint <http://www.tricentis.com/imprint/>
